Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the project schedule for potential delays or issues.
Contact @SDes-1 and @SDes-2 to discuss the system design progress and confirm whether it follows the schedule. @PEOPLE: @SDes-1, @SDes-2, Topic: System Design Progress
Monitor task progress in the project management software. Follow up with team members who are behind schedule.
Address any questions or roadblocks reported by the team members. Provide guidance and support as needed.
Prepare a draft of the weekly progress report for executive leadership. Include key accomplishments, challenges, and upcoming milestones.
Schedule a meeting with @LDes-1 to review the progress report and obtain feedback. @PEOPLE: @LDes-1, Topic: Weekly Progress Report Review
Meeting with @LDes-1 to review the progress report and obtain feedback. Incorporate feedback from @LDes-1 into the progress report.
Analyze project data in the project management software to identify trends and areas for improvement.
Document lessons learned from the first week of the project. Share these lessons with the team.
Review progress, update project schedule, and finalize the weekly progress report for executive leadership.
